revised_title: Studies on the Properties and Selectivity of Lipase Enzymes
tldr: This article investigates the action of lipase enzymes, specifically Ricinus lipase found in castor oil plants. The author discovers that this enzyme requires an acidic environment to function and acts preferentially on natural fats. The study also compares the action of animal lipase on various ethereal salts and natural fats, highlighting the differences in their selectivity and properties.
